name: ѕριяιт яαρριηg ѕєѕѕιση 01
description:
ѕριяιт яαρριηg ѕєѕѕιση 01 is the genesis of a series exploring the parallels between our subconscious and waking realities, and with our digital and physical lives.

As a child, I dreamt of fragmented figures spread out on ornately patterned rugs. Many years later, when I incorporated 3D modeling into my art practice, I decided to reconstruct this subconscious vision. I started by digitally sculpting my own relics, placing fragments of a 3D scan of my own face alongside 3D scans of death masks and antiquities. I also digitally assembled the background tapestry, remixing medieval tapestries and contemporary rug patterns. This is the beginning of an ongoing series that recontextualizes themes of occultism, science fiction, and psychology.
